column5: Rod was bouncing, I dought it was in that cold water temps. LMAO  Glad ya got out bud, and nice fish. Now wait til it boat worthy will ya.
So much for the citiots just falling through the ice. Lol.  In all seriousness, glad you got out!
Glad you got out in one piece bud, ive been through when i was younger and its pure adrenaline that gets you out quick. Looks like youre waiting for softwater with me now lol.
lucky, lucky and lucky...  glad you are ok Chris
Yup, the ice this year has been unpredictable since day one. Glad you're ok dude!  S.

Rod was bouncing, I dought it was in that cold water temps. LMAO    You're right Bri. I included a picture of my shriveled skin rod but Art removed it.  So much for the citiots just falling through the ice. Lol.  In all seriousness, glad you got out!  Thanks VXP. but idiot or citiot would have been a fair reply to this report.  Gallie and Shayne, next weekend, bring your ice gear and a change of clothes, it's not over yet!

Im just glad you didn't miss that bite.  In all seriousness, I'm glad it worked out. Consider it practice with the intent of never doing it again  That crust walk with Little Fisher sounds awesome. I've been doing the same with my girl
Glad you ended up on the topside!  Jesus.  Scary stuff when you think about it.
The crusty snow this year is awesome  I think after tomorrows trip the snowmachine goes away.  Glad you got some greys and lived to tell the tale.  Same spot next weekend?
Glad you made it out, you never know next time....do us all a favor and wait till spring  Great outing otherwise.  Dave
Holy crap ... Close call Chris !!!! glad it worked out in your favour
Falls through ice, gets out, lands fish!  Legend!  Glad everything worked out Chris!  And wow lil fisher is getting big!!!!
Hey Chris  Not a good time of year for swimming!!!  As Gallie said the adrenaline rush can give ya 'wings'  The 'little' fella is growing   He will love this summer at the lake  Cheers Rick
